title: mrtyunjayam
sahitya:
mrtyunjayam ArUDham mInAmbikApatim 
mrgatAtam viSaharam mEru sadanam haram


anupallavi

  krtyAlankAram nigamAgama sAram nija bhakta mandAram nirmalAkAram


caraNam    harikEsham amalAngam Ananda vigraham girijApatim laya gIta sukhadAyam
 sharaNAgata trANam sakala shubha kAraNam satatam bhajEham saccidAkAram
